title: refund points
body: if only i could get 1 refund point for christmas ;_; i wish lol

replies.body: Don't really see why this was downvoted. An annual refund token would be cool. What are people gonna do - rent a skin for a year?
I think your idea is very good.

Because they didn't have to give any refund tokens at all and ended up giving every player three available refunds? It's a valuable life lesson, be more careful about what you buy if you're going to want to refund it later.

1. Tribunal pls
2. Refund tokens pls
3. Bring URF back pls
